title: Motel Björkäng
description: This is where I started my professional career. I began working in the dishwashing area, then moved on to managing the salad bar, and eventually started working in the kitchen while studying in the Hotel and Restaurant Management program.

title: Högfjällshotellet
description: Here, I worked as a chef on the winters between 2009-2011. My responsibilities included ala carte, conferences with events in Sami huts, with snowmobile transport.

title: Hotel Skansen
description: Here, I worked as a chef on the summers between 2010-2011. My responsibilities included ala carte, weddings, and conferences.

title: Norra Hamnen 5
description: Here, I worked as the sous chef and later as the head chef. My responsibilities included menu planning, inventory management, and staff coordination. 2012-2017.

title: Prästgatan
description: Here, I worked as a chef after moving back home, serving lunch and handling occasional evening events. We also organized cooking classes for small groups. 2017-2018.

title: NP.Bemanning
description: The feeling of being stuck without growth made me want to try something new. Since 2018, I have been working as a carpenter, where I have earned my professional certification.
